title: 1932년 Yost 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Yost. 판결일: 1932-01-27. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: YOST v. STATE
**판결일**: 1932-01-27
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Hawkins

## 변호인

Eddie Roark, of Dallas, for appellant., Lloyd W. Davidson, State’s Atty., of Austin, for the State.

## 인용

- 45 S.W.2d 980

## 판결문 요약


HAWKINS, J.
Conviction is for robbery, punishment being assessed at thirty-five years in the penitentiary.
The record is before this court without statement of facts or bills of exception. In such condition nothing is presented for review.
The judgment is affirmed.
...
